subject: SV: 回复：Order #SSN1048
description_text:
Hi again! I finally received the delivery from you. But I immediately discovered a problem with the SQ shifter. It only registers in one direction. I have tried to disassemble it to see the problem but it seems to be the circuit board that is not working properly.
what can we do to try to fix the problem?

Best regards
Andreas
________________________________
Från: General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>
Skickat: den 6 mars 2025 07:52
Till: Andreas ?nstad <adde_anstad2@hotmail.com>
Ämne: 回复：Order #SSN1048

Hello, due to the operation error of our new staff, your parcel into the warehouse failed, there is such a long stagnation, I am very sorry for the delay caused to you . We have taken care of it for you, and it is expected to be delivered for you around the 10th, here is the link to your logistic information. Sincere apologies!
https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=1Z01E9E16727005836


Andreas ?nstad<adde_anstad2@hotmail.com> 在 2025年3月6日 周四 3:42 写道：
Hi.
Can you please track where my package is? Still have not recieved the items i ordered..

Best regards, Andreas

conversations.body_text: Hi Andreas Ånstad,  Could you please provide a video and share it with us via Google Drive? We will check to see if there are any incorrect settings.
